Bluetooth access is required for connecting to possible ELD devices.
Bluetooth access is required for connecting to possible ELD devices.
Access to calendar may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
Access to camera may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
Access to contacts may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
Location is required for proper driver's geolocation when transporting a load and displaying on the in-app map or providing directions.

Location is required for proper driver's geolocation when transporting a load and displaying on the in-app map or providing directions.
Microphone may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
Motion sensor may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
Access to files and photos is required for uploading images, scanning or uploading documents (BOL) regarding the load transported.
Reminder permission may be required for the proper functioning of certain plugins (no direct usage).
